hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:“On the Day of Khaibar, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade eating any predatory animal that has fangs and any bird that has talons.”

chapter.ara-name: باب كُلِّ ذِي نَابٍ مِنَ السِّبَاعِ
chapter.eng-name: Eating any predatory animal that has fangs
